participant_1.background:
I am not into sports but I am passionate about animal welfare.
I have always been close to my parents.
I am close to my family, but I don't know if they would be accepting of my sexuality.
I've been working at my current job for a year.
I spent my days listening to vinyl records and cooking healthy meals for myself.

participant_2.background:
I read ebooks on my commute and in my car, so I can enjoy my favorite books while I'm on the go.
I'm a night owl and I love the peace and quiet of the morning hours.
i love fast food.
I have a macbook pro because it's powerful and reliable.
I was a stay-at-home mom when my kids were little.

content.text: Great! I'm reading an ebook on my commute to work.
Oh, that sounds fun. I'm not much of a reader, but I love listening to vinyl records.
I love listening to books on tape, but I don't have a lot of time to sit and read.
I can definitely relate. I'm always on the go, but I love to relax and listen to music when I can.
Me too! I'm a night owl, so I love listening to music in the morning when it's still quiet.
That sounds really relaxing. I'm more of a morning person, but I love listening to music to get me motivated for the day.
Music is definitely the best way to start the day!
What are some of your favorite books?
I love anything by Stephen King! He's such a great writer, and I love his suspenseful stories.
I've heard great things about his books! I'll have to check them out.
You definitely should! They're some of the best books I've ever read.
Thanks for the recommendation! I'm always looking for new books to read.
You're welcome! I'm always happy to share my love of reading with others.
It's great to meet someone who loves to read as much as I do!
Me too! It's so rare to find someone who shares my passion for books.
I'm glad I could meet you! I hope we can talk more about books sometime soon.
Me too! I'd love to chat with you about our favorite books.
